name: nanocut-server
description: Production-ready URL shortener with email login

scripts.upload: git diff --quiet && git diff --cached --quiet && echo 'No changes to commit' || (git add . && git commit -m "auto-update" && git push origin main)
scripts.download: git fetch origin && git reset --hard origin/main && git clean -fd && echo 'Project updated from GitHub'

author: Muhammad Sohaib Ali
